channel.title: Maxed Combat.. Money making?
channel.description:
I'm maxed combat, and I need to know how to make money. Here are some of my skills. [img]http://gyazo.com/24d01608d0e1b941f13d8f000dabfbee.png[/img]
Also have 20m. Any good monsters or skill guides that would be good for me?

item.title: Maxed Combat.. Money making?
item.dc:creator: @IceKy IceKy
item.description:
@IceKy wrote:

Obviously bought the account :S? Why.

Read full topic

item.title: Maxed Combat.. Money making?
item.dc:creator: @TTSxClan TTSxClan
item.description:
@TTSxClan wrote:

[quote=“Java-RSPS-Noob, post:14, topic:527939”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=646692.msg4349205#msg4349205 date=1376399367]

Maxed combat what? You are 80 summoning…

Considering you are 99 slayer you could always just do slayer that’s always nice. There are several bosses you can mage now as well.

Sounds like you’re new to the EoC combat formula.

I think, similar to me, Java-RSPS-Noob read it as maxed combat stats rather than maxed combat level, as the title and post are a bit ambiguous.
[/quote]^ this even though technically he is also right. I am still learning about the EOC style.[/quote]Ahh. My mistake with the title

Read full topic

[/quote]

I think, similar to me, Java-RSPS-Noob read it as maxed combat stats rather than maxed combat level, as the title and post are a bit ambiguous. :P[/quote]^ this even though technically he is also right. I am still learning about the EOC style.

item.title: Maxed Combat.. Money making?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Cannons suck, but cambat is such a joke now that it is not necessary. Ganodermic Beasts are still very good money, just camp them for a while. No need for stat boosting potions either really.

Read full topic

item.title: Maxed Combat.. Money making?
item.dc:creator: @TTSxClan TTSxClan
item.description:
@TTSxClan wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:10, topic:527939”][quote author=Null Amount link=topic=646692.msg4349099#msg4349099 date=1376370464]

[quote author=TTSxClan link=topic=646692.msg4349098#msg4349098 date=1376370306]

Maxed combat yet doesn’t know how to make money, level 91 farming yet doesn’t know how to make money, 99 fletching yet doesn’t know how to make money. Two skills that can make quite a bit of cash and you have great levels in both.
[/quote]Coming back after not playing in years? Yeah.
So far, with fletching, I have found horrid ways of making money, as for farming, I haven’t done much with.
[/quote]How have you not done much with farming when you have 91 in it? It’s not a particularly fast skill.

If you want to train farming the fastest way, it will make you lose quite a bit of money.[/quote]
What about slayer? Any monsters that are good to use a cannon on anymore?

Read full topic

So far, with fletching, I have found horrid ways of making money, as for farming, I haven’t done much with.
[/quote]How have you not done much with farming when you have 91 in it? It’s not a particularly fast skill.[/quote]
If you want to train farming the fastest way, it will make you lose quite a bit of money.

item.title: Maxed Combat.. Money making?

item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“Java-RSPS-Noob, post:2, topic:527939”]Maxed combat what? You are 80 summoning…

Considering you are 99 slayer you could always just do slayer that’s always nice. There are several bosses you can mage now as well.[/quote]
Sounds like you’re new to the EoC combat formula.

OP: You can easily take on majority of the bosses minus a few like Vorago because you need to have good gear to even stand a chance as well as a good team of 5+ people.

item.title: Maxed Combat.. Money making?
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:3, topic:527939”][quote author=Java-RSPS-Noob link=topic=646692.msg4349079#msg4349079 date=1376366322]
Maxed combat what? You are 80 summoning…

Considering you are 99 slayer you could always just do slayer that’s always nice. There are several bosses you can mage now as well.
[/quote]
Combat is now based off your 2 highest combat related skills, +2.
99 HP + 99 Attack + 2 = 200.
Maxed combat.[/quote]highest combat skill + defense level + 2

Read full topic
